title: Unable to connect to server
body:
When I try to play a custom, before the matchmaking screen I got message "unable to connect to the server. Pkease check connection........." I translated by myself from Italian. I tryed many times in this weeks and today successfully played a custom, then I tryed a pvp aram and got stuck again on this message. 

H E L P

replies.body: Let's try updating a few of your network settings to see if that will give your client an easier time getting hooked up with our EUW servers. Check out our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some general basic troubleshooting steps, but I've found in the past that the points on port forwarding and DNS servers seem to help most of the time.
